content.raw:
Yeah, I almost want to make this an assert because it's very rare that the `PhysicsEngine` object would be null without `this` being null. For reference, `PresetManager` is a member variable of `World`, which also has a member variable `PhysicsEngine`. `PresetManager` has a pointer to that same `PhysicsEngine`. But it could happen (maybe in the future when we allow for the destruction and creation of a `PhysicsEngine` during runtime?)

783e8c5
content.html:
Yeah, I almost want to make this an assert because it's very rare that the PhysicsEngine object would be null without this being null. For reference, PresetManager is a member variable of World, which also has a member variable PhysicsEngine. PresetManager has a pointer to that same PhysicsEngine. But it could happen (maybe in the future when we allow for the destruction and creation of a PhysicsEngine during runtime?)
